title: Mikhail Borovoi
summary: Mikhail Vol'fovich Borovoi (Russian: Михаи́л Во́льфович Борово́й, Hebrew: מיכאל בורובוי, born February 17, 1951) is a Soviet and Israeli mathematician.  He has worked on Galois cohomology and on the arithmetic of linear algebraic groups, homogeneous spaces, Shimura varieties, and spherical varieties.
